content: crochet astra doily - doilies are very versatile and can be used for many different things around your home like table mats plant pants wall art etc the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** sizes approx 13 diameter level intermediate copyright ©2022 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/astra-crochet-doily-pattern/
